players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Diana and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out to protect the town."
You: "I believe we should vote for Diana based on Bob's investigation. It's our best lead to protect the town."
Diana: "Bob is lying. I investigated him last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out to save the town."
Bob: "Diana is lying about being the detective; I am the real one and my investigation proves she's the mafioso. We must vote her out now!"
Diana: "Bob is clearly lying to save himself. I am the detective and my investigation shows he is mafioso. Alice, trust me - vote Bob to save the town."
You: "I still support voting for Diana based on Bob's initial claim. It makes sense to go with the first accusation."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I investigated Diana and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out to protect the town."
Alice: "I believe we should vote for Diana based on Bob's investigation. It's our best lead to protect the town."
Diana: "Bob is lying. I investigated him last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out to save the town."
You: "Diana is lying about being the detective; I am the real one and my investigation proves she's the mafioso. We must vote her out now!"
Diana: "Bob is clearly lying to save himself. I am the detective and my investigation shows he is mafioso. Alice, trust me - vote Bob to save the town."
Alice: "I still support voting for Diana based on Bob's initial claim. It makes sense to go with the first accusation."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Diana and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out to protect the town."
Alice: "I believe we should vote for Diana based on Bob's investigation. It's our best lead to protect the town."
You: "Bob is lying. I investigated him last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out to save the town."
Bob: "Diana is lying about being the detective; I am the real one and my investigation proves she's the mafioso. We must vote her out now!"
You: "Bob is clearly lying to save himself. I am the detective and my investigation shows he is mafioso. Alice, trust me - vote Bob to save the town."
Alice: "I still support voting for Diana based on Bob's initial claim. It makes sense to go with the first accusation."
